title: Sven Erik Paulsen
text: Sven Erik Paulsen (born 30 March 1946) is a Norwegian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201972%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a>.
